title: Belgium Retail Sales MoM
description: Retail Sales in Belgium increased 1.10 percent in September of 2022 over the previous month. Retail Sales MoM in Belgium averaged 0.12 percent from 1998 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 12.80 percent in May of 2020 and a record low of -9.40 percent in November of 2020. In Belgium, the Retail sales report provides an aggregated measure of sales of retail goods and services over a specific time period. In Belgium, Retail sales are seasonal, volatile and relatively important to the overall economy. This page provides - Belgium Retail Sales MoM - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: EUROSTAT
